item.title: Snowden (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!!
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:15.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “Disc Only – GUARANTEED TO PLAY! Depending on what we have in stock, may also include case, digital copy, etc.” Genre: Drama Format: DVD Sub-Genre: Biography Release Date: 12/27/2016 Leading Role: Zachary Quinto, Shailene Woodley, Melissa Chessington Leo, Tom Wilkinson, Joseph Gordon-Levitt Rating: R Director: Oliver Stone Region Code: Region 1 UPC: 025192343483 ISBN: 9781524775919 Snowden (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Oliver Stone directed this docudrama about controversial whistle-blower Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) and his decision to leak classified information from the NSA about a covert surveillance program. Shailene Woodley, Zachary Quinto, Melissa Leo, and Nicolas Cage co-star., Oliver Stone directed this docudrama about whistle-blower Edward Snowden, who decided to leak classified information from the NSA in order to expose a massive, covert surveillance program orchestrated by the U.S. government. The film traces Snowden’s career in both the NSA and CIA as he becomes disillusioned with his work and receives support from his idealistic girlfriend (Shailene Woodley). Rhys Ifans, Nicolas Cage, Melissa Leo, Zachary Quinto, and Tom Wilkinson co-star., Oliver Stone directs his attention to the still-unfolding saga of controversial whistleblower Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) in this biopic depicting how exposing abuses of power at the NSA made Snowden the world’s most wanted fugitive. Product Details Number of Discs: 1 Rating: R (MPAA) Film Country: USA UPC: 025192343483 Additional Details Genre: Dramas Format: DVD “A quiet, crisply drawn portrait of the world’s most celebrated whistle-blower….Mr. Stone has made an honorable and absorbing contribution to the imaginative record of our confusing times.”New York Times – A. O. Scott (09/15/2016) “SNOWDEN is a superbly crafted, engrossing film that, while making no bones about admiring the central character’s actions and motivations, doesn’t go to visual or psychological extremes to make its case.”Washington Post (09/15/2016) “There are excellent turns by Melissa Leo, Zachary Quinto, Tom Wilkinson as MacAskill, and Lakeith Stanfield, his usual excellent, low-key self as a fellow surveillance geek who shares Snowden’s misgivings.”Boston Globe – Ty Burr (09/15/2016) 3 stars out of 4 — “As Snowden continues to get deeper into the rabbit hole of privacy invasion, Gordon-Levitt’s performance becomes more exceptional….He grounds a complex story by giving it a very human, reactive element at its center.”RogerEbert.com – Brian Tallerico (09/16/2016) 3 stars out of 5 — “Woodley lights up every scene, Rhys Ifans sells his quietly sinister father figure and Gordon-Levitt grows into a performance that initially seems distractingly mannered.”Empire – Empire Staff (12/05/2016) Portions of this page Copyright 1981 – 2017 Muze Inc. All rights reserved. View on eBay

The post Snowden (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!! appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.

Seller Notes: “Disc Only – GUARANTEED TO PLAY! Depending on what we have in stock, may also include case, digital copy, etc.”

Genre: Drama Format: DVD
Sub-Genre: Biography Release Date: 12/27/2016
Leading Role: Zachary Quinto, Shailene Woodley, Melissa Chessington Leo, Tom Wilkinson, Joseph Gordon-Levitt Rating: R
Director: Oliver Stone Region Code: Region 1
UPC:

025192343483

 ISBN:

9781524775919

Snowden (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Oliver Stone directed this docudrama about controversial whistle-blower Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) and his decision to leak classified information from the NSA about a covert surveillance program. Shailene Woodley, Zachary Quinto, Melissa Leo, and Nicolas Cage co-star., Oliver Stone directed this docudrama about whistle-blower Edward Snowden, who decided to leak classified information from the NSA in order to expose a massive, covert surveillance program orchestrated by the U.S. government. The film traces Snowden’s career in both the NSA and CIA as he becomes disillusioned with his work and receives support from his idealistic girlfriend (Shailene Woodley). Rhys Ifans, Nicolas Cage, Melissa Leo, Zachary Quinto, and Tom Wilkinson co-star., Oliver Stone directs his attention to the still-unfolding saga of controversial whistleblower Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) in this biopic depicting how exposing abuses of power at the NSA made Snowden the world’s most wanted fugitive.

Product Details
Number of Discs: 1
Rating: R (MPAA)
Film Country: USA
UPC: 025192343483


Additional Details
Genre: Dramas
Format: DVD


“A quiet, crisply drawn portrait of the world’s most celebrated whistle-blower….Mr. Stone has made an honorable and absorbing contribution to the imaginative record of our confusing times.”
New York Times – A. O. Scott (09/15/2016)

“SNOWDEN is a superbly crafted, engrossing film that, while making no bones about admiring the central character’s actions and motivations, doesn’t go to visual or psychological extremes to make its case.”
Washington Post (09/15/2016)

“There are excellent turns by Melissa Leo, Zachary Quinto, Tom Wilkinson as MacAskill, and Lakeith Stanfield, his usual excellent, low-key self as a fellow surveillance geek who shares Snowden’s misgivings.”
Boston Globe – Ty Burr (09/15/2016)

3 stars out of 4 — “As Snowden continues to get deeper into the rabbit hole of privacy invasion, Gordon-Levitt’s performance becomes more exceptional….He grounds a complex story by giving it a very human, reactive element at its center.”
RogerEbert.com – Brian Tallerico (09/16/2016)

3 stars out of 5 — “Woodley lights up every scene, Rhys Ifans sells his quietly sinister father figure and Gordon-Levitt grows into a performance that initially seems distractingly mannered.”
Empire – Empire Staff (12/05/2016)

item.title: God of War: Origins Collection – PlayStation 3
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:17.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “GAME DISK ONLY! Every game we sell is GUARANTEED TO WORK! May have markings, discoloration, scratches, or other cosmetic flaws. This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 3 Rating: M – Mature Release Year: 2011 Genre: Compilation Sports Sub-Genre: Action/Adventure Game Name: God of War: Origins Collection MPN: BCUS-98289 UPC: 711719828921 God of War: Origins Collection (Sony PlayStation 3, 2011) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Originally released in 2011, this collection for the PS3 features two God of War video games on one Blu-ray Disc. It is a must-have for any fans of the God of War franchise. The collection contains both ‘God of War: Chains of Olympus’ and ‘God of War: Ghost of Sparta.’ These third-person, action-adventure games are set in the exciting world of Greek mythology. They were once only playable on Sony’s portable device, the PSP. Now, they are available as a single package for the stationary PlayStation 3.The remastered ‘God of War Origins Collection’ for PS3 is in full 1080p and stereoscopic 3-D. Both installments allow players to uncover pieces of the main character’s past. These separate stories open up the world introduced in the original games. ‘God of War: Chains of Olympus,’ is a prequel to the first installment of the franchise. It originally came out in 2008. You play as Kratos, who is also known as the Ghost of Sparta. The Spartan warrior serves the gods of Olympus. Players go on a quest to find the sun god, Helios, at the request of Athena. Throughout the levels, players acquire weapons and use combo fighting moves to defeat enemies. When fighting bosses and tougher enemies, players will be prompted to execute quick-time events. The game also has platforming elements and presents players with tricky puzzles they must solve.The events of ‘God of War: Ghost of Sparta’ occur following the first God of War game. At this point in the series, Kratos has earned a victory against Ares and become the God of War. However, Kratos has become plagued by nightmares of his past. In this installment, the Ghost of Sparta sets out to find answers about his life. Players embark on an action-packed adventure across a mythical landscape, which includes the city of Atlantis. They fight undead soldiers and mythical monsters along the way. ‘God of War: Ghost of Sparta’ was first released for PSP in 2010. Critics cited it as having some of the most impressive graphics of any game for the Playstation Portable.The first God of War game was developed by Santa Monica Studio. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment in 2005 for the Playstation 2. Over time, the games have gained a strong legion of fans and many favorable ratings. Players love the action-based gameplay, superb level design, amazing graphics, and creative storylines. This set allows fans to go deeper into the mythology presented in the first two God of War games. On the PS3 edition, players will discover features that weren’t available when the games were released on PSP. Both games now include trophies and are compatible with DualShock 3 rumble controllers. It’s also the first installment of the series to be released in stereoscopic 3-D and has a high-definition resolution. Bonus content includes a behind-the-scenes video, ‘God of War – Game Directors Live,’ documenting the creation of the games. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher Sony Computer Entertainment America, Inc. Game God of War: Origins Collection MPN BCUS-98289 UPC 711719828921 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 3 ESRB Rating M – Mature Genre Compilation Location USA Tech Details ESRB Descriptor Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Sexual Content Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1 Release Year 2011 Game Special Features Features a story line set before the original Gods of War on PlayStation 2 Master new weapons and magic-oriented attacks while journeying through the underworld Explore Kratos dark past in a story that looks back at his tragic mortal youth Engage in fast-flowing, bloody battles against undead legions and legendary monsters Two PSP games re-mastered and available on PS3 for the first time Game Series God of War Series View on eBay

The post God of War: Origins Collection – PlayStation 3 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.
